name: THE TESTER
description:
You, Mr. Stickman, are a Security System Tester and now you are trapped in a room, surrounded by the  dark, while the security system keeps shooting beams to you! Avoid the lasers and collect all the chips you can to show who is the best tester!

CONTROLS:

ARROWS: Move, Crouch & Jump.

Z Button : Jump.

X Button: Dash.

C Button: Reflectors.

Reflectors erase all beams on screen! But you must collect the item first!

___

Hey! My name is Noar, the creator. 

This is my first videogame made with Unity. 

As the name says, it's just a game test that I made to enter this world and keep doing great things.

I will start to upload new games soon and make videos of game development. 

Hope you enjoy it!
